abstract.t: This document defines protocol mechanisms to allow clients, using NETCONF or RESTCONF, to choose which YANG schema to use for interactions with a server, out of the available YANG schemas supported by a server. The provided functionality allow servers to support clients in a backwards compatible way, at the same time allowing for non-backwards-compatible updates to YANG modules. This draft provides a solution to YANG versioning requirements 3.1 and 3.2.
